title: issues: Support getting an Issue from an IssueRef
body: Adds support for getting an issue by ID directly.

title: Shorten builders and Display impls, fix typos, etc
body: A bit of a mixed bag of commits. I'm happy to drop or rework any as you please.

title: Remove duplicate field definitions in RepoEditOptionsBuilder
body: This is at the cost of RepoEditOptions having a Default instance.

title: Document use of POST rather than PATCH in repo edit
body: I noticed my typo in post-merge review. Surprisingly following the documentation actually breaks my test. So instead I'm leaving a notice with my findings.

title: Add repo edit
body: Before I yak-shave my way into a pointless pit, I'm submitting this PR for early review. Let me know what it's missing to be accepted and/or what I should be doing differently.

title: add support for fetching git data: trees and blobs
Add API for adding a comment to an issue.
body:
There doesn't appear to be an API for adding a comment to an issue, and I wanted one for https://github.com/dbaron/wgmeeting-github-ircbot.  So this adds one, which I used to produce https://github.com/dbaron/wgmeeting-github-ircbot/issues/1#issuecomment-294101464.

This appeared to me at a quick glance to be the logical way to add the API.

title: Serde upgrade
body: this branch contains a decent sized refactor for modernzing use of serde and packaging of model representations

title: Bump Hyper to support 0.10 as well.
body: Updates the Hyper dependency to cover both the 0.9 and 0.10 series. (Straddling both avoids the need to make a major bump to this crate.)

title: add a method returning the underlying Repo object from a Repository
